content.title: Vievlog - Funda ku-inthanethi mahhala | Izifundo kanye nezivivinyo
content.oneStopPlatform: I-Vievlog - iplatifomu yakho yokufunda yamahhala ye-IT
content.startLearningNow: Qala ukuyifunda futhi ulungiselele ukuhlolwa kwe-TOPIK
content.learnIT: Finyelela izifundo ezisezingeni eliphakeme, tutorials, kanye nezinsizakusebenza ezivela kubafundisi bochwepheshe ngaphandle kwezindleko.
content.learnFromExperts: Yifunde kusuka ezikhulumeni zomdabu kanye nangochwepheshe abanolwazi.
content.anytimeAnywhere: Yifunde nganoma yisiphi isikhathi, noma kuphi
content.learnAtYourOwnPace: Sitadishe ngejubane lakho ngokufinyelela okungenamkhawulo kuzo zonke izifundo.
content.coverAllAspects: Izifundo ezimboza izisekelo ezinezihloko ezithuthukile, kufaka phakathi uhlelo lolimi, ulwazimagama, kanye nomkhuba wengxoxo.
content.viewAllIT: Bheka zonke izivivinyo ze-vivievlog it kanye nezifundo

testimonial1.quote: IVievlog yangisiza ukuba ngilungiselele ngempumelelo ukuhlolwa kwami ​​kwe-IT.
testimonial1.name: Nguyen Minh anh

testimonial2.quote: Ukuyifunda nge-vivievlog akukaze kube lula futhi kube mnandi ngokwengeziwe!
testimonial2.name: Tran Hai Nam

testimonial3.quote: Ngenxa ye-vivievlog, ngithuthukise amakhono ami we-IT ngokubabazekayo.
testimonial3.name: ULe Thanh Huong

content.yourOneStopShop: Ipulatifomu yakho eyodwa yokumisa izivivinyo ze-IT kanye nezivivinyo ze-Topik. Finyelela izinsiza zokufunda ze-premium mahhala futhi ufinyelele olimini lwakho kanye nezinhloso zanamuhla!

metadata.lesson: Dlulisa amehlo ezifundweni zethu zakamuva zamahhala ze-IT futhi uthole inkambo ephelele yeleveli yakho yekhono.
metadata.grammar: Hlola imidwebo yethu enemininingwane ye-IT kanye nama-tutorials.
